content: total row each each 0 ⚪ ⚪ 5 15 9 8 1 🔵 🔴 7 19 13 10 2 ⚪ 🔴 9 23 13 12 3 🔵 🔴 11 27 17 14 4 ⚪ 🔴 13 31 17 16 5 🔵 🔴 15 35 21 18 6 ⚪ 🔴 17 39 21 20 7 🔵 🔴 19 43 25 22 8 ⚪ 🔴 21 47 25 24 9 🔵 🔴 23 51 29 26 10 ⚪ 🔴 25 55 29 28 11 🔵 🔴 27 59 33 30 12 ⚪ 🔴 29 63 33 32 13 🔵 🔴 31 67 37 34 14 ⚪ 🔴 33 71 37 36 15 🔵 🔴 35 75 41 38 summary at end of yoke ● yoke depth approx 29 cm ● sleeve stitch count at split approx 34 cm circumference ● bust width at split approx 110-113 cm section 3 body a separate body & sleeves the body and sleeves are separated after completing the yoke front bands remain continuous at both edges and are worked straight throughout © 2026 qing studio ltd this pattern is for personal use only no part of this publication may be reproduced distributed or sold without written permission 13 separation row rs with rs facing work across the row as follows work the left front band stitches in double knit as established work front left in half brioche place the raglan stitches 5 sts left sleeve stitches and the raglan stitches after on waste yarn co 7 underarm stitches work back section in half brioche stitch place the raglan stitches right sleeve stitches and the raglan stitches after on waste yarn co 7 underarm stitches work front right in half brioche work the right front band in double knit as established stitch count size m front left yoke 36 sts back 77 sts front right yoke 36 sts underarm 14 sts 7 each side total body stitches excluding bands 163 sts b underarm the underarm stitches are co to bridge the front and back pieces and form a stable join between body and sleeves underarm cast-on at each underarm gap cable co 1 stitch from the space between the last 2 stitches you just worked cable co 5 more stitches from that new stitch cable co 1 stitch from the space between the next 2 stitches on lhn these stitches are worked immediately into the half brioche pattern on the following row c body with body stitches joined and underarm stitches co continue working the body flat maintain the established stitch patterns double knit across the 8 front band stitches at each edge half brioche across all body stitches between the bands including underarm stitches buttonhole 4 on rs row 22 work buttonhole 4 into the left front band while working the body buttonhole 5 on rs row 30 work buttonhole 5 into the left front band © 2026 qing studio ltd this pattern is for personal use only no part of this publication may be reproduced
